component.name: MRA-MARINa Analysis
component.author: Califano lab (C2B2)
component.description: This component implements Master Regulator Analysis using a server-side implementation of GSEA. It attempts to identify transcription factors or signalling molecules which control a set of differentially expressed target genes (TGs). GSEA is used to evaluate the enrichment of the set of differentially expressed genes and the targets of the regulatory molecules. An ARACNe-style network of regulatory interactions is required.
